thread.title: Stuart Weitzman puts his personal shoe collection on exhibit in New York

title: Stuart Weitzman puts his personal shoe collection on exhibit in New York
text:
Stuart Weitzman puts his personal shoe collection on exhibit in New York 1:49am IST - 01:33 
The famed footwear designer's collection includes both historic and iconic pieces. Rough cut (no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
